messages.content: What is the size of lebanon in m2

Lebanon has an area of approximately 10,452 square kilometers. To convert this to square meters (m²), you multiply by 1,000,000 (since 1 km² = 1,000,000 m²).

So, 10,452 km² = 10,452,000,000 m².

Therefore, the size of Lebanon is about **10.452 billion square meters**.
